attributes.action: Make online trolling bullying and racism a crime with a 5 year minimum sentance
attributes.additional_details: People are committing suicide due to online bullying harrassment and racism it needs to stop to help prevent suicide and protect people’s mental health on social media platforms
attributes.background: Make any online bullying, trolling and racist abuse a crime that’s punishable by minimum 5 yr jail sentence, this will stop this behaviour

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Increase legal penalties for those convicted of online racial abuse
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591776
